H0.text: On which river are the Victoria Falls. Nile

H1.text: On which river are the Victoria Falls. Congo

H2.text: On which river are the Victoria Falls. Orange

H3.text: On which river are the Victoria Falls. Zambesi

A4.text: Victoria Falls is a waterfall on the Zambezi River

A5.text: The Victoria Falls are considered the boundary between the upper and middle Zambezi

A6.text: The Zambezi is also spelled Zambeze and Zambesi
